name: Alhambra
quote: Justice is an unassailable fortress, built on the brow of a mountain which cannot be overthrown by the violence of torrents, nor demolished by the force of armies.

name: Great Library
quote: Libraries are as the shrine where all the relics of the ancient saints, full of true virtue, and all that without delusion or imposture are preserved and reposed.

name: Mausoleum of Halicarnassus
quote: The whole earth is the tomb of heroic men and their story is not given only on stone over their clay but abides everywhere without visible symbol woven into the stuff of other men's lives.

name: Pyramids
quote: O, let not the pains of death which come upon thee enter into my body. I am the god Tem, and I am in the foremost part of the sky, and the power which protecteth me is that which is with all the gods forever.
quotee: The Book of the Dead, translated by Sir Ernest Alfred Wallis Budge

name: Statue of Zeus
quote: He spoke, the son of Kronos, and nodded his head with the dark brows, and the immortally anointed hair of the great god swept from his divine head, and all Olympos was shaken.

name: Stonehenge
quote: Time crumbles things; everything grows old and is forgotten under the power of time.

name: Temple of Artemis
quote: It is not so much for its beauty that the forest makes a claim upon men's hearts, as for that subtle something, that quality of air, that emanation from old trees, that so wonderfully changes and renews a weary spirit.

name: Colossus
quote: Why man, he doth bestride the narrow world like a colossus; and we petty men walk under his huge legs, and peep about to find ourselves dishonorable graves.

name: Great Lighthouse
quote: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters; these see the works of the Lord, and his wonders in the deep.

name: Great Wall
quote: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's... not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.

name: Hanging Gardens
quote: I think that if ever a mortal heard the word of God it would be in a garden at the cool of the day.

name: Oracle
quote: The ancient Oracle said that I was the wisest of all the Greeks. It is because I alone, of all the Greeks, know that I know nothing.

name: Parthenon
quote: Earth proudly wears the Parthenon as the best gem upon her zone.

name: Petra
quote: ...who drinks the water I shall give him, says the Lord, will have a spring inside him welling up for eternal life. Let them bring me to your holy mountain in the place where you dwell. Across the desert and through the mountain to the Canyon of the Crescent Moon...

name: Terracotta Army
quote: Regard your soldiers as your children, and they will follow you into the deepest valleys; look on them as your own beloved sons, and they will stand by you even unto death.

name: Angkor Wat
quote: The temple is like no other building in the world. It has towers and decoration and all the refinements which the human genius can conceive of.

name: Borobudur
quote: When you realize how perfect everything is, you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.

name: Chichen Itza
quote: The katun is established at Chichen Itza. The settlement of the Itza shall take place there. The quetzal shall come, the green bird shall come. Ah Kantenal shall come. It is the word of God. The Itza shall come.

name: Great Mosque of Djenne
quote: With the magnificence of eternity before us, let time, with all its fluctuations, dwindle into its own littleness.

name: Hagia Sophia
quote: For it soars to a height to match the sky, and as if surging up from amongst the other buildings it stands on high and looks down upon the remainder of the city, adorning it, because it is a part of it, but glorying in its own beauty.

name: Machu Picchu
quote: Few romances can ever surpass that of the granite citadel on top of the beetling precipices of Machu Picchu, the crown of Inca Land.

name: Notre Dame
quote: Architecture has recorded the great ideas of the human race. Not only every religious symbol, but every human thought has its page in that vast book.

name: Forbidden Palace
quote: Most of us can, as we choose, make of this world either a palace or a prison.

name: Globe Theatre
quote: Totus mundus agit histrionem
quotee: Inscription above main entrance to the Globe Theatre

name: Himeji Castle
quote: Bushido is realized in the presence of death. This means choosing death whenever there is a choice between life and death. There is no other reasoning.

name: Leaning Tower of Pisa
quote: Don't clap too hard - it's a very old building.

name: Porcelain Tower
quote: Things always seem fairer when we look back at them, and it is out of that inaccessible tower of the past that Longing leans and beckons.

name: Red Fort
quote: When we build, let us think that we build forever.

name: Sistine Chapel
quote: I live and love in God's peculiar light.

name: Taj Mahal
quote: The Taj Mahal rises above the banks of the river like a solitary tear suspended on the cheek of time.

name: Uffizi
quote: The painter is not simply someone who looks and who sees. Above all, the artist is someone who exposes a personal vision by rendering it visible.

name: Big Ben
quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed: a plan, and not quite enough time.

name: Brandenburg Gate
quote: Pale Death beats equally at the poor man's gate and at the palaces of kings.

name: Louvre
quote: Every genuine work of art has as much reason for being as the earth and the sun.

name: Broadway
quote: Broadway is a main artery of New York cultural life - the hardened artery.

name: Eiffel Tower
quote: We live only to discover beauty. All else is a form of waiting.

name: Kremlin
quote: The Law is a fortress on a hill that armies cannot take or floods wash away.

name: Neuschwanstein
quote: ...the location is one of the most beautiful to be found, holy and unapproachable, a worthy temple for the divine friend who has brought salvation and true blessing to the world.

name: Prora
quote: This loss (of freedom) means the fading from human life of values infinitely precious to it. There only remain ironbound conditions of employment and trivial amusements for leisure.

name: Statue of Liberty
quote: Give me your tired, your poor,Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free,The wretched refuse of your teeming shore.Send these, the homeless, tempest - tossed to me,I lift my lamp beside the golden door!

name: Cristo Redentor
quote: Come to me, all who labor and are heavy burdened, and I will give you rest.

name: Great Firewall
quote: Distrust and caution are the parents of security.

name: Pentagon
quote: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensible.

name: Sydney Opera House
quote: Those who lose dreaming are lost.

name: CN Tower
quote: Nothing travels faster than the speed of light with the possible exception of bad news, which obeys its own special laws.

name: Hubble Space Telescope
quote: The wonder is, not that the field of stars is so vast, but that man has measured it.

name: International Space Station
quote: Building one space station for everyone was and is insane; we should have built a dozen.

name: United Nations
quote: More than ever before in human history, we share a common destiny. We can master it only if we face it together. And that is why we have the United Nations.
